entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow except blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:07 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow except blizzard near the Richardson mountains early in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:07 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:07 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24. Forecast issued 10:07 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
